actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to eliminate the existing exemption for labor, agricultural, and horticultural organizations.

summary.text: Eliminates from the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 the exemption for labor, agricultural, and horticultural organizations which is a tax exempt organization under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to eliminate the existing exemption for labor, agricultural, and horticultural organizations.
